thread.title: Fear casts shadow over Burundi referendum

title: Fear casts shadow over Burundi referendum
text:
Fear casts shadow over Burundi referendum 12:13pm EDT - 01:43
Burundi is voting in a referendum that would allow the president, Pierre Nkurunziza, to add another two terms to the three he has served already. His opponents say they've been harassed and threatened, and there are fears of ethnic conflict and further repression. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Burundi is voting in a referendum that would allow the president, Pierre Nkurunziza, to add another two terms to the three he has served already. His opponents say they've been harassed and threatened, and there are fears of ethnic conflict and further repression.
